title: I Want Them to Stay Like That
detail_text: <:th_ch0003/>So then, Honoka-chan got a bump on her head<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Uwaah, that sounds rough. Umi-chan’s lecture must’ve been long~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Ahaha, it might have been quite long. But Umi-chan must’ve been really worried about her too, right<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Speaking of which, I think our Chika-chan got into similar situations like that. And every time she did, Kanan-chan would lecture her~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>They’re just so reckless and make you anxious, huh. But....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ah, I think I understand that feeling. But we still want them to keep looking forward and run with all their might, don’t we....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>That’s right! I want them to strive for greatness and keep running. If they’re about to fall down, then we can just hold them up<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Even if they did fall down, they would just get up all okay, right!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Fufu, that’s true. I want them to stay the way they are forever and ever<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Yeah! Anxiously watching over them has also become somewhat fun, hasn’t it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
